name: Stone Giant
description: Stone Giants are massive, gray-skinned humanoids who dwell deep in caves and mountainous regions. They can shape their environment with remarkable precision and are guardians of the natural stone beneath the earth.
memorable: Stone Giants can hurl boulders with deadly accuracy and are powerful warriors when provoked.
goals: They prefer isolation and act as keepers of ancient secrets hidden within the mountains.
relations: They might be encountered with other giant kin or can be found in cooperation with creatures of mountains and caves.
strengths: Exceptional Strength of 23 allows them to deal significant melee damage and manipulate foes easily, while their camouflage provides steath in rocky terrain.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to being knocked prone can hinder their combat effectiveness.
attacks: Attacks include devastating greatclub strikes that can knock creatures prone and ranged rock throws that can incapacitate opponents.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to throw grappling targets up to 30 feet, providing both damage and movement manipulation during combat.
senses: Remains undetected in rocky terrain with advantage on Stealth checks due to Stone Camouflage.
skills: Noteworthy skills in Athletics and Stealth, reinforcing their physical prowess and ability to remain hidden.
additional_information: Resistance to acid damage and immunity to petrification.
High hit points enable them to absorb considerable damage.
Possesses rock catching ability to negate projectile damage.
Can perform wrestling maneuvers against grappled creatures.
Long-lived beings, often serving as guardians.
test_queries: giant that throws rocks and grapples
powerful melee giant with high hit points
